statements: SELECT * FROM targets
SELECT id, name, access_level FROM targets
SELECT name, target_status FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'Admin'
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE target_status = 'Active' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'User' AND target_status = 'Inactive'
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, access_level FROM targets WHERE target_status = 'Active'
SELECT id, name, target_status FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'User' AND target_status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name, access_level FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'Manager' AND target_status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'Admin' AND target_status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE access_level='Admin';
SELECT target_name FROM targets WHERE target_id=1;
SELECT * FROM access_privileges WHERE privilege_type='Read';
SELECT target_id, privilege_type FROM access_privileges WHERE privilege_id=2;
SELECT target_id, COUNT(*) AS total_privileges FROM access_privileges GROUP BY target_id;
SELECT target_id, target_name, access_level FROM targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT target_name, target_id FROM targets ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(target_id) as avg_target_id, COUNT(target_id) as total_targets FROM targets;
SELECT t.target_name, a.privilege_type FROM targets t JOIN access_privileges a ON t.target_id = a.target_id;
SELECT * FROM access_privileges;
SELECT target_name, privilege_level FROM access_privileges ORDER BY target_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM access_privileges WHERE privilege_level = 'admin';
SELECT target_name, access_date FROM access_privileges WHERE access_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_privileges;
SELECT target_name, privilege_level FROM access_privileges WHERE privilege_level='Admin';
SELECT id, target_name, access_date FROM access_privileges ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT attacker_name, target_name, method_used FROM social_engineering WHERE successful=true;
SELECT target_name, access_time FROM unauthorized_access WHERE access_method='Brute Force' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT target_id, target_name FROM targets ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT privilege_id, privilege_name, description FROM privileges WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, privilege_id, target_id FROM user_access WHERE privilege_id = 1;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activity ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT target_name, access_level FROM targets WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM privileges WHERE description LIKE '%restricted%';
SELECT target_name, privilege_name, description FROM targets JOIN privileges ON targets.target_id = privileges.privilege_id;
SELECT user_id, target_name, activity_type FROM user_access JOIN targets ON user_access.target_id = targets.target_id JOIN suspicious_activity ON user_access.user_id = suspicious_activity.user_id;
SELECT privilege_name, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM user_access JOIN privileges ON user_access.privilege_id = privileges.privilege_id GROUP BY privilege_name ORDER BY user_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT target_name, target_email FROM targets ORDER BY target_name ASC;
SELECT target_id, target_name, target_role FROM targets WHERE target_role = 'Admin';
SELECT access_type, access_date FROM accesses WHERE access_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY access_date DESC;
SELECT privilege_type FROM privileges WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE target_role = 'Admin';
SELECT target_name, target_email FROM targets ORDER BY target_name DESC;
SELECT target_name, target_email FROM targets WHERE target_role = 'User' ORDER BY target_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM accesses JOIN targets ON accesses.target_id = targets.target_id ORDER BY accesses.access_date DESC;

SELECT privileges.privilege_type, targets.target_name, accesses.access_date FROM privileges JOIN targets ON privileges.target_id = targets.target_id JOIN accesses ON privileges.target_id = accesses.target_id ORDER BY accesses.access_date ASC;
